definitions.body: having mastery: [[בָּרוּחַ]] ´[[אֵין אָדָם שׁ]]: Ec 8:8; elsewhere as subst. ´[[הַשּׁ]]: the ruler Ec 10:5, so (c. [[עַל־הָאָרֶץ]]) Ge 42:6 (prob. late substitution for original word of E); pl. as subst. [[שַׁלִּיטִים]] Ec 7:19 (specif. of Alex.’s successors Perles:Anal. 42).
domineering, imperious, fs. (Kö: ii. 10. 201) [[אִשָּׁה זוֹנׇה]] [[שַׁלָָּטֶת]] Ez Eze 16:30 (Jerusalem personified).
